body:
Well for those who want to build a map but with a basic plugin to help you fill blocks or copy regions I decided I would make a youtube series going over all of the commands for world edit so you can build your map. My youtube is ElementPro it does have lots of Avicus videos and has more coming.
--------------------

Also does anyone know if you can record tournaments if your not media rank?

title: Learn how to use worldedit!

replies.body: You can only record the tournament game you're playing. You can't spectate the game and record if you don't have he media rank.
replies.body_tagged: You can only record the tournament game you're playing. You can't spectate the game and record if you don't have he media rank.

replies.body: are we allowed to apply for the Media rank.. like now?
